import React from "react"; import "../css/SignUp.css"; import { useState, useEffect, useRef } from "react"; function SignUp() { const [user, setUser] = useState({ name: "", email: "", password: "", }); const onChange = e =>{ const {name, value} = e.target; setUser({...user, [name]:value}) } return (

Sign Up!

); } export default SignUp;
